biotools.summary: New, easy-to-use webserver for the prediction of binding partners for modular protein domains. The server comprises three different tools, i.e. SH2PepInt, SH3PepInt and PDZPepInt, for predicting the binding partners of three different modular protein domains, i.e. SH2, SH3 and PDZ domains, respectively.

bioschemas.name: MoDPepInt
